name: agile-bored
description: An agile board, for those who are bored with the current state of agile.

scripts.start: concurrently --prefix '[{name}]' --names 'SERVER,CLIENT' -c 'white.bgBlue.bold,black.bgGreen.bold' 'cd server; npm run start' 'cd client; au run --watch'
scripts.install-all: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install

author: Michael Malone
